entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING, Weyburn

entry.title: Thursday: Snow and blowing snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow. Risk of freezing drizzle early this morning. Blowing snow early this morning. Amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High zero. Wind chill minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CST Thursday 20 April 2023
